products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 128GB storage, and a powerful Exynos 2100 processor. It has a 64MP triple camera setup and supports 5G connectivity.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 14
products.description: The new MacBook Pro 14 features the powerful M1 Pro chip, a stunning 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and a long-lasting battery life. Ideal for professionals and creatives.

mobilePlans.name: Unlimited 5G Plan
mobilePlans.description: Unlimited talk, text, and data with access to the 5G network. Includes free international texting and hotspot data.

mobilePlans.name: Prepaid 10GB Plan
mobilePlans.description: Includes 10GB of high-speed data, unlimited talk and text, and 3GB of hotspot data. No contract required.

broadcastPlans.name: Premium HD Channels Package
broadcastPlans.description: Access to 150+ HD channels including sports, movies, and international channels. Includes 100 hours of DVR storage.

broadcastPlans.name: Basic Cable Package
broadcastPlans.description: Access to 50+ channels including news, kids, and local networks. No DVR storage included.

telecomServices.name: Home Internet 500Mbps
telecomServices.description: High-speed home internet with 500Mbps download and upload speeds. Includes free router and 24/7 tech support.

telecomServices.name: Fiber Optic 1Gbps
telecomServices.description: Blazing fast fiber optic internet with 1Gbps speeds, perfect for gaming and streaming. Includes free router and security features.
